Package com.bytedesk.social.instagram

Class InstagramPrivateRepliesController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.social.instagram.InstagramPrivateRepliesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/instagram/private-replies") public class InstagramPrivateRepliesController extends Object
Instagram私密回复控制器 提供REST API接口用于发送私密回复和管理相关功能 https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/instagram/features/private-replies
